                       9999999999999

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *   
This simple game just a learning project my Learn Python3 Cource on codecademy
Enter your name and push ENTER to start a divination. 
After it you can read your I Ching advice. 
Disclaimer: This is just the game! Please do not use it to make real decisions
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
